titles.title: Nationwide Gun Buyback Act of 2007
To assist local governments in conducting gun buyback programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/4/2007--Introduced. Nationwide Gun Buyback Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to local governments to conduct gun buyback programs. Defines "gun buyback program" as a local law enforcement program for purchasing, or accepting donations of, firearms (as defined by the federal criminal code) from individuals or groups desiring to dispose of firearms.
